price: Dan ada (pula) orang-orang lain yang ditangguhkan sampai ada keputusan Allah; adakalanya Allah akan mengazab mereka dan adakalanya Allah akan menerima tobat mereka.  Dan Allah Maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Bijaksana.
arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرۡجَوۡنَ لِأَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمۡ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waākharūna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi immā yuʿadhibuhum wa-immā yatūbu ʿalayhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
